Maqbool is a 45-year-old lady who has five children. She has been running a business of cattle purchasing and selling for the past two years. She purchases cattle from the city market at lower rates and sells them in her locality. The income is used to support her entire family. 

She is in her seventh loan cycle. Now, she has requested an amount of 45,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees). She intends to use this loan amount to buy more cattle for resale purposes, so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income. She dreams of extending her home in the future.

loans.use: to buy more cattle for resale purposes.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a 26-year-old who is married and lives Zamboanga del Sur with her family. Her husband is a farmer, and she helped him with earning by managing her retail store to earn a living. She has been doing this for five years to earn a living. 

She borrowed a loan from GDMPC Micro Credit to buy more grocery goods to sell. She plans to grow vegetables in her backyard in order to generate more income for the future of the family.

loans.use: to buy more grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Valentino

texts.en: Valentino is a married man who has four children and a dependent. Valentino lives in rural Ntungamo and is a farmer who does both growing of crops and rearing of animals on a small scale for both home consumption and selling the surplus. He buys goats from the rural markets and sells them at a profit to the farmers as well as butchers. He will use this particular loan to buy goats that he will rear for a few months and later sell. He thanks the Kiva lenders for the financial support and is committed to continue growing the business using the loan funds.

loans.use: To buy goats to sell

loans.name: Imaan

texts.en:
Imaan is a 24-year-old married woman who has been running a business of milk selling with her husband since five years ago. They have one cow, one buffalo and six goats for milking. She looks after the cattle, feeds them and performs the task of collecting milk from them. She earns enough income to meet the expenses of her family. She has one child. 

In order to make more profits, she requested a loan of 45,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees) to purchase another buffalo for milking. She is hopeful that another buffalo will help to increase her milk sales.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo for milking.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is a 50-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, clothing and education. She along with her husband has been doing the work of agriculture since many years ago. They crop different vegetables and fruits and sell them in the local market. Her son also assists her in growing various crops. 

She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. In order to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides, Naseem applied for her fifth loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees). This would help her to grow more crops, which will ultimately help in generating more income.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Shkila

texts.en: Shkila is a 31-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. Six years ago, she decided to work with her husband to support her family for a better future. Therefore, she began to purchase and sell bangles. She has the complete support and assistance of her husband. Over time, the customer base of her business has greatly increased. With the help of the income from this business, Shkila has been able to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She is in her third loan cycle with Kashf Foundation and has now requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. With this loan, she wants to buy stock of bangles in greater variety and styles from the wholesale market. She has high hopes of a rise in income, which she wants to spend on the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy bangles in greater variety and styles from the wholesale market.

loans.name: Selvavinayagar Shg - Kathiramangalam Group

texts.en:
Selvavinayagar Self Help Group is managed by local NGO, People Action for Transformation (PAT), in Tamil Nadu, India. 

Megala is 38 years old, married and the featured borrower of this group. She is living in Kathiramangalam village in her own house with her husband, Selvaraj and their two children. Her husband is a farmer. 

Megala wants to purchase a smokeless stove that reduces the problems of climate change, quality of life, and deforestation, saves time and money and reduces home-borne disease. Currently, Megala is using a firewood convention stove in her kitchen that emits a lot of carbon dioxide and increases the risk of getting respiratory diseases.
 
Megala and the other members of the group are requesting a loan to buy smokeless stoves to lead a healthier life. 

Megala aims to provide better education for her children and improve the economic condition of the house.

loans.use: to buy smokeless stoves

loans.name: Selveria

texts.en: Selveria owns and operates a garden in the village of Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur. Her husband is a farmer and their main source of income. She joined Gata Daku MPC and she borrowed a loan to purchase fertilizer for their rice farm. While her three children are in their younger years, she saves a portion of her income for their education. She wants to improve the general living conditions of her family as well as to provide a better education to her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Maria Fabiola

texts.es:
María Fabiola es la orgullosa propietaria de un negocio de venta de mercancía como electrodomésticos puesto que sufrió mucho y paso por varios altibajos para llegar a consolidar y tener su mercancía para distribuir.
María a pesar de su negocio no olvida que es una mujer con problemas financieros y al ser soltera tiene que ayudar a sus padres para el mantenimiento del hogar. 
Solicita un crédito para la compra de mercancía como ventiladores, planchas, licuadoras entre otros, pues con el crédito tendrá capital de trabajo para laborar. 
Sueña con tener buenas ventas para poder tener su negocio en un local estable y no estar de ambulante yendo de un lado para otro.
texts.en:
María Fabiola is the proud owner of a business in which she sells merchandise such as household appliances. She has experienced many ups and downs while trying to get her business established and acquiring merchandise for distribution. Despite having her business, María doesn’t forget that she is a woman with financial problems since she is single and helping her parents with sustaining their household.

María is requesting a loan in order to buy merchandise such as electric fans, irons, blenders, and other items. With this loan, she will have the operating capital that she needs for her work.

María dreams of generating good sales so that she can have her business in a stable location, which would prevent her from having to travel from one place to another.

loans.use: to buy household appliances such as electric fans, irons, and blenders to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in new merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: Para la compra de aguacate, mamón, ayotes, yucas, pulseras, anillos y cadenas.

loans.name: Heriberto De Jesus

texts.es:
Heriberto, solicita un nuevo préstamo con el que podrá comprar herbicidas, insecticidas, abono y semilla, y así seguirá cultivando maíz y frijol, tanto para cubrir las necesidades de su familia y como las demandas de sus clientes.
La inversión del crédito anterior en su negocio le dio una mejor cosecha y ganancias con las que ha logrado cubrir sus gastos familiares y cancelar sus deudas. Su familia vive en unas mejores circunstancias lo que es muy satisfactorio y  más aún cuando ya tiene un  nuevo miembro.
texts.en:
Heriberto is requesting a new loan in order to buy herbicides, insecticides, compost, and seeds. He continues to cultivate corn and beans so that he can cover his family’s needs, as well as meet the demands of his customers.

By investing his previous loan into his business, Heriberto was able to achieve a better harvest. With the profits, he was able to cover his family’s expenses and repay his debts. His family lives under better circumstances. What is even more satisfying is that he welcomed a new member into his family.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, insecticides, compost, and seeds.

loans.name: Emele

texts.es:
La señora  Emele de 36 años de edad, vive con su esposo,  tiene dos  hijas  que  dependen de ellos y vive en casa propia en  una comunidad de Trojes al oriente de Honduras.
Doña Emele se dedica desde hace 03 años a la venta de abarrotería sus clientes son amigos y vecinos de la comunidad donde vive, está solicitando el préstamo para comprar: arroz, frijoles, harina, maíz, manteca, cal, café, azúcar, frescos, jugos, etc.  Con el apoyo del préstamo espera mejorar su negocio y tener mejores ingresos para poder seguir apoyando a su familia.
Doña Emele su sueño es engrandecer su negocio y poder siempre brindarles educación a sus hijas.

 Trojes, Honduras - Junio del 2014.
texts.en:
Sra. Emele is 36 years old and lives with her husband. They have two daughters who are dependent on them. She lives in her own home in the community of Trojes, which is in eastern Honduras.

Doña Emele has been selling groceries for three years. Her customers include friends and neighbors from the community where she lives. Emele is requesting a loan in order to buy rice, beans, flour, corn, lard, lime powder, coffee, sugar, soft drinks, juices, and other items. With the help of this loan, she hopes to improve her business and have more income so that she can continue supporting her family.

Her dreams include expanding her business and providing an education for her daughters.

Trojes, Honduras - June 2014

loans.use: to buy various products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Gulraftor

texts.ru: Гулрафтор трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей.  Она хочет создать хорошею условию жизни для своих детей. Она хочет организовать свой бизнес . С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес  купле продажей  детской одежды.  От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  4700 сомони для покупки товара, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulraftor is hardworking woman. She is married and raising 2 children. She wants to create good living conditions for her children. She wants to organize her own business. With this goal in mind, she completed the "Achieve Success" course, organized by the Association of Business Women, and obtained a certificate. Now she is capable of organizing her own business and become successful in this field. She wants to start a business of selling children's clothing. She wants to use the resulting income to provide her children with a good education and high-quality food products. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 4700 somoni to buy merchandise to start her new business. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing in order to start her own business

loans.name: Patricia Guadalupe

texts.es: Patricia es una señora muy trabajadora que se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales, ella es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 4, 6 y 12 años de edad que se encuentran estudiando, con el crédito que le otorga Fodemi va a  comprar  chanchos para incrementar su negocio,  Patricia en un futuro aspira comprarse una casa propia ya que en la actualidad vive en una casa que le presta un familiar, y ella sigue trabajando para que sus hijos logren culminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Patricia is a hardworking woman who is devoted to farming and raising pigs. She is married and has three children (ages 4, 6, and 12) who are in school.

With this loan from FODEMI, she will buy pigs so that she can increase her business. In the future, Patricia aspires to buy a house of her own. Her family currently lives in a house that is being loaned to them by a relative. She continues to work so that her children can finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Doña Juana es originaria del área de San Martin Jilotepeque  y desde hace más de quince años es propietaria de un deposito de gaseosas en el cual ofrece a sus clientes un gran surtido de gaseosas de todos sabores, marcas y presentaciones, su negocio está ubicado en el exterior del mercado municipal de dicha área y es allí donde sus clientes llegan a comprarle sus productos. El sueño de doña Juana es implementar nuevos productos para así vender más. Solicita el crédito para la compra de Jugos por bandeja en diferentes sabores, marcas y presentaciones.
texts.en:
Doña Juana is originally from the area of San Martin Jilotepeque. For more than 15 years, she has been the owner of a soft drink shop where she offers her customers a wide variety of sodas in all types of flavors, brands, and packaging.

Her business is located outside of the municipal market in an area where her customers can come by to purchase her products. Doña Juana dreams of introducing new products so that she can sell more. She is requesting a loan in order to buy juices by the case in different flavors, brands, and packaging.

loans.use: to buy water, sodas, and juices to sell.

loans.name: Neema Kimara Group

texts.en:
Elibariki is the father of two schooling sons and is in his early thirties. He is married and for eight years has been running a cafe selling cold soft drinks and bites like chapati and other snacks. He also serves chips with meat and chicken fried in pieces (mishkaki). He starts working from 9 am to midnight daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

He is always optimistic in nature and desires to grow his food business more. He is requesting a loan to be apportioned among Neema Kimara, a five-member group. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. For Elibariki, this is his twelfth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous credits, which he has since repaid, to buy a business fridge, rent a nice business room and replenish his food store with ingredients. He manages to control his business and received extra income which he used to cover his home food expenses and school fees. In the coming years, he would like to be a successful father. Elibariki will use his portion to buy food stock of sodas, juices, baking flour, rice, etc.

loans.use: to buy food stock of sodas, juices, baking flour, rice, etc.

loans.name: Severa

texts.es: La señora Severa es  de estado civil soltera, habita en una zona rural del municipio de Pocona, tiene un hijo pero ya no está a su cargo ya que el mismo se independizo, la señora es de condiciones humildes, su principal actividad es la agricultura que produce todo el año papa, haba y maíz. Tiene vivienda propia pero es antigua y rustica, vive junto a su madre que ya es de edad avanzada a quien le ayuda, para su trabajo utiliza personal eventual del lugar para que le colaboren en la siembra y cosecha de productos agrícolas. Actualmente se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para la compra de terreno agrícola para incrementar su producción y mejorar tanto sus ingresos como sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Sra. Severa is single and lives in a rural area in the town of Pocona. She has a son who is no longer under her charge and is living independently.

Sra. Severa comes from humble beginnings. Her main business activity is farming and she is producing potatoes, beans, and corn throughout the year. She has a home of her own, but it is old and made of basic materials. Severa lives with her elderly mother and is helping her. For the farm work, she hires seasonal workers to help with planting and harvesting her products.

Severa currently needs a loan so that she can buy a plot of farmland in order to increase her production. This will improve her earnings, as well as her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy farmland.

loans.name: Shama

texts.en:
Shama is a 32-year-old woman and the mother of four children. She is running a business making woollen items. Shama makes caps, sweaters and bed sheets at home to sell in the market. 

She is in her sixth loan cycle, and has requested a loan amount of 40,000 PKR. Shama wants to use this amount to purchase wool yarns in different colours and packs of needles. She is hopeful that her hard work will pay and she will be able to earn more income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase wool yarns in different colours and packs of needles.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is 39 years old and married with four children. With three children in school, she works very hard to provide for them. Analyn's business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. She has restarted her general store business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Analyn has taken out a PHP 8,314 housing loan through NWTF in order to purchase materials to rebuild her family home. She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Analyn is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and in future would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Esha

texts.en:
Esha is a 35-year-old woman who is blessed with three children and married to Jillo who adds additional income to support their family. Esha has been operating a material and clothing boutique business for nine years, earning an income of KES 15,000 at the end of every month.

Esha is now servicing her second loan of KES 45,000 with VisionFund Kenya and intends to use the entire amount of money to buy trouser suits, skirt suits, children's and men's wear, satin material and silk material, which are quite in demand at the moment.

Esha plans to use the anticipated income to pay school fees for her children and hopes to improve the living standards of her family by building a permanent family house.

loans.use: to buy more variety and different designs of clothes to add to her stock.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.en: Luisa has been selling firewood in their village while her husband is earning by working as a driver. For many years, she was able to sustain their living. She wants to engage in another line of business, raising pigs to sell. She joined GDMPC and has borrowed a new loan to buy piglets. She wants to earn more to support the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy piglets

loans.name: Sergia

texts.en:
Sergia, a resident of Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur, is married with one child. Her husband is a farmer and she helps him to operate their farm to make a living. Aside from this, she also sells grocery goods in their village. Some of their farm products especially bananas are sold in her store when ripe. Sergia has many customers for her bananas as they taste good and are fresh from their farm.  

Sergia joined Gata Daku MPC and has borrowed a new loan to buy additional grocery goods to sell. In her determination to see her child become successful, she hopes to gain more income from her farm to save a portion for her child's future education.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
Virgilia is 43 years old and married with six children. She has been earning a living by farming rice in the Philippines for eight years and earns additional income from raising pigs.

Virgilia is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy rice seed, fertilizers and other farm supplies. She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy rice seed, fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Nestora

texts.en:
Nestora is 50 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Nestora is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Nestora has been farming rice for 30 years and earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Alfredo Luis

texts.es: Alfredo aprovechó su anterior credikiva para comprar nuevas lavadoras y fortalecer así su infraestructura de negocio, con el fin de mejorar cada vez mas. Alfredo está muy agradecido con Kiva y con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, y pide que sigan apoyándole. Pues ahora tiene una solicitud de crédito para comprar nuevas máquinas, pues su clientela ha seguido creciendo y la demanda en muy buena, con ello terminará de remplazar las viejas lavadoras y modernizar su actividad.
texts.en: Alfredo took advantage of his previous CrediKiva loan to buy new washing machines to strengthen the infrastructure of his business, in an effort to make lasting improvements.  He is very grateful to Kiva and the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation and asks that they continue to support him.  The loan he is requesting now is to buy new machines since his clientele has grown and there is a very high demand.  This way he can replace the old machines and modernize his business.

loans.use: To buy new machinery.

loans.name: Robina

texts.en:
Robina was able to purchase rice and flour for her general store with the previous Kiva loan. She successfully repaid the loan on time. The loan helped her to increase her income from the store, with this income partly spent on  household expenses and her children’s health. She is thankful to her lenders and Kiva for their help and support. 

Now, Robina has requested her second loan from Kiva of 40,000 PKR. With this loan amount, she wants to purchase packs of spices, grains, biscuits, beverages, etc. to sell. She is hopeful that this loan will further help her in improving her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to purchase packs of spices, grains, biscuits, beverages, etc. to sell

loans.name: Kousar

texts.en: Kousar is a 44-year-old married woman. She has seven children. For the past six years, she has been running a business purchasing and selling livestock, along with her husband. She looks after the livestock and is responsible for feeding them, while her husband sells them to different markets in the city. Their business is providing them with enough income to support their family. However, they need to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures including food, health and clothing. In order to expand their earnings, Kousar has requested a loan amount of 30,000 PKR to buy more livestock such as baby goats and sheep for resale purposes. She is hopeful that expanding the business will help in improving her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy more livestock such as baby goats and sheep.

loans.name: Herney

texts.es:
Herney un cocinero de talla mundial criado en las calles y es este el lugar de trabajo pues todos los días cocina en leña sus comidas típicas, y es por esto que tienen un sabor especial que no es fácil encontrar.
Las comidas hechas a fuego de leña son muy famosas en toda Colombia por ser las que mejor sabor y cocción y sabe que indirectamente muchas personas depende de él, pues tiene una persona confiable a quien comprarle el alimento. 
Solicita un crédito para la compra de una olla grande para cocinar, también para insumos como vegetales, abarrotes, leña etc. Con este crédito lograra mejorar su producción diaria y por ende sus ventas demostrando que se puede encontrar un gran sabor en las calles.
texts.en:
Herney is a world class cook who was raised in the streets which is where he works every day cooking regional dishes over a wood fire.  This is why they have a special flavor that is not easy to find.

Foods cooked over a wood fire are very famous in all of Colombia because they have the best flavor.  Herney knows that many people depend on him because he is a trustworthy person and people buy his food because of it.

The loan he is requesting is to buy a large pot for cooking.  He also will buy supplies such as vegetables, groceries, firewood, etc.  With this loan he will improve his daily products and sales, while demonstrating that great flavors can be found in the streets.

loans.use: To buy a giant pot and supplies to make food.

loans.name: Samreena

texts.en: Samreena is a 23-year-old married woman and a mother of one. She has been doing the business of tailoring for the past five years to support her husband in providing for the family. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of their household. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. In her second loan cycle, she has requested for a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons, laces etc. In this way, she will be able to meet the increasing demands of her customers. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Samreena hopes to grow her business by expanding her customer base.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread and packs of buttons and laces

loans.name: Emilse

texts.es:
Emilse es una humilde joven que aprendió del mundo de las artesanías gracias a su madre quien la enseño y le guio por este camino y le mostro formas de generar capital para auto-sostenerse.
Emilse es una mujer que ha vivido mucho tiempo bajo mandato y ordenes de otras personas por ello quiere independizarse y demostrar que puede generar su capital que puede tener un trabajo y mantener un hogar.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de materiales para la fabricación de Bolsos, tendidos, manillas, pulseras tendidos, cobertores entre otros. 
Su principal sueño es poder montar una empresa de artesanías y bordados
texts.en:
Emilse is a humble young woman who learned about the world of handicrafts from her mother, who taught her and guided her down the road of being able to earn an income and become self-sufficient. She has lived a long time under the rules and orders of other people, which is why she wants to become independent and demonstrate that she can earn an income, maintain a job, and support a household.

Emilse is requesting a loan in order to buy materials for making bags, quilts, wristbands, woven bracelets, blankets, and other items. Her main goal is to establish a craft and embroidery company.

loans.use: to buy craft materials.

loans.name: Rosa Dalia

texts.es: Rosa de 58 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se gana la vida por medio de la crianza de pollos los cuales compra pequeños los cría y luego los vende en su comunidad y los cantones vecinos, además su compañero de vida aporta a la economía familiar por medio de su trabajo de agricultor. Rosa desea construir un corredor en su vivienda por lo que  solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar láminas, polines y pernos para poder colocar techo al corredor de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rosa, 58, lives with her common-law partner.  She is a very hard working woman who earns a living raising chickens.  She buys chicks and raises them, then sells them in the community and neighboring cantons.  Her husband also contributes to the household economy working as a farmer.

Rosa wants to build a porch on her house and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy metal sheeting, beams, nuts and bolts to build the roof of the porch.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, beams, nuts and bolts to build a porch.

loans.name: Tahmina

texts.en:
Tahmina was born in 1979. She is married and the caring mother of two children. Tahmina has received a pedagogical education. At first, she worked in a school. 

Two years ago, Tahmina began her own business selling fabrics. She sells fabrics in a local market where she has a store. Every season, she renews the assortment of her goods. Tahmina was going to renew the assortment of her goods for the new season but she did not have enough money. She is requesting a loan of 7,000 somoni to buy fabrics for the new season. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy fabrics for the new season

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a 43-year-old married man and the father of six children with whom he lives in Dhamar, Yemen. He is an educated man with a university education. 

Mohammed is a very ambitious and active man. He always thinks about the future and developments in the future. Mohammed tries to provide his family with things which are new. He wants to acquire two new Galaxy mobile phones for his children. Unfortunately, he doesn't have enough money. As a result, Mohammed has applied for a loan of 120,000 YER from AMB to purchase two new Galaxy mobile phones for his children.

Mohammed looks forward to opening a store to sell mobile phones and their accessories.

loans.use: to purchase two new Galaxy mobile phones for his children.

loans.name: Sardar

texts.en: Sardar is a 61-year-old married woman doing a business of cattle purchase and sales with the help of her husband for many years. She sells cattle in different markets in the city. Her business is good enough to provide her family with a decent living. She is a mother of two children. She is in her second loan cycle and has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR. She intends to use the loan to purchase more cattle to increase her sales. She is hopeful that her business will generate a greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle

loans.name: Manuel Augusto

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre de 28 años de edad, vive con su pareja, no tiene hijos y su negocio es la venta de ropa.
Su carácter es amable y perseverante, su vida diaria gira alrededor de su negocio, el trabaja duro para algún día formar una familia con su novia a quien ama con todo su corazón.
Manuel es de tez blanca, cabello negro y ojos obscuros, su estatura es alta. Los horarios de trabajo de su negocio son de lunes a domingo desde las nueve de la mañana hasta las nueve de la noche, él lleva dos años de experiencia en su trabajo. Su meta es convertirse en un comerciante mayorista con ropa exclusiva para todas las edades.
Es por esos motivos que Manuel solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa por mayor y cumplir la meta de su vida.
texts.en:
Manuel is a 28 year old man. He lives with his partner, has no children and his business is the sale of clothing. His character is kind and persevering, his daily life revolves around his business; he works hard so that one day he can have a family with his girlfriend, who he loves with all of his heart. 

Manuel has a fair complexion, black hair and dark eyes, and is tall. His work schedule for his business is from Monday to Sunday, from nine in the morning until nine at night. He has two years of experience in his work. His goal is to become a wholesale businessman with exclusive clothing for all ages. 

It is for these motives that Manuel is requesting a loan, for the purchase of bulk clothing and to achieve his life goal.

loans.use: to buy bulk clothing and to accomplish his life goal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy electronics and TVs

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy beans and yams

loans.name: José Constantino

texts.es:
José de 39 años de edad, es una persona con buena disposición de servicio a su comunidad, muy conocido por la actividad que realiza y muy respetado por sus vecinos y amistades,  él se dedica a los trabajos de la agricultura y los días viernes por la mañana se dedica  a la compra y venta de ganado en el tiangue municipal. En su mayoría el ganado que compra es ganado a precio económico para ser puesto en cuidado y recuperación para posteriormente ser vendidos a las personas que se dedican al destazo.

José creció con sus padres quienes fueron las personas que se encargaron de inculcarle buenos principios los que lo han llevado hacer una excelente persona de bien para su hogar y su comunidad su familia formada por su esposa y sus tres hijos los que ya están estudiando en la escuela de su comunidad. 

José, se dedica a la agricultura actividad que aprendió de sus padres quienes le enseñaron y adquirió experiencia en realizar esta actividad que se ha convertido en una de sus principales fuentes de ingresos, de la misma forma también se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado los días viernes de extingue municipal,  a realizar esta actividad eventualmente lo acompaña su hijo mayor quien se está formando en el negocio y adquiere experiencia para realizar este negocio.

El dinero será utilizado para comprar ganado a precio económico para posteriormente venderlo a un mejor precio, ya que esta actividad le producirá una ganancia la que le servirá para cumplir con el compromiso de su deuda adquirida y satisfacer las necesidades de su hogar, también parte del dinero será utilizado en preparación de alimento para el ganado ya que cuenta con suficiente maíz que será procesado y convertido en harina para ganado de esta forma ahorrara dinero en alimento para el ganado. 

Las proyecciones que tiene para un futuro son las de cumplir los sueños de sus hijos que son los de estudiar agronomía y veterinaria, pagar el crédito y hacer una nueva solicitud por un monto mayor para construir unas  instalaciones más grandes para la crianza de cerdos y cuido de ganado, y todo esto será logrado con la ayuda de un nuevo crédito y con la eficiente inversión de sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Jose, 39, is a person with a good disposition toward community service.  He is well known for his business and very respected among neighbors and friends.  He is a farmer and every Friday morning buys and sells cattle at the municipal market.  Most of the cattle is low priced and in need of care and recuperation before being sold to butchers.

Jose was raised by parents who taught him good values which have made him an excellent family man and community citizen.  His family comprises his wife and three children who attend school in the community.

Jose learned about agriculture through his parents and he acquired experience by working in the trade.  It is one of his main sources of income.  He also buys and sells cattle at the Friday municipal market.  His eldest son goes with him and is getting training in the business.

The loan will be used to buy low priced cattle to be sold for a profit.  The profit will be used to pay off debt and cover household expenses.  Part of the money also will be used to prepare animal feed, since he has enough corn to be processed and turned into flour for the cattle.  This will save him money where feed is concerned.

His plans for the future include seeing his children studying agronomy and veterinary medicine, paying back the loan and requesting another one to build larger facilities to raise pigs and care for the cattle.  All of this will be done with a new loan and efficient investment of his profit.

loans.use: To buy cattle at a low price to sell it for a profit, and to prepare animal feed.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca, who is married with seven children, resides in the village of Mahayag, Zamboanga del Sur with her family. Her husband is a farmer while she is engaged in a services-based business providing manicures and pedicures in their village. 

Francisca has joined Gata Daku MPC and has borrowed a loan to buy new sets of manicure and pedicure tools. She wants to improve their farm as well as her manicure and pedicure services in order to generate additional income for her family's future.

loans.use: to buy new sets of manicure and pedicure tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase used clothing in bulk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hair extensions

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice and seasoning to expand her business.

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
Eusebia de 43 años de edad, es muy responsable y con excelentes referencias de personas de la comunidad, madre soltera de 3 hijos  de los cuales son dos varones  y una niña todos se encuentran estudiando educación básica en la escuela de su comunidad, la señora posee una mini tienda y venta de tortillas y trabaja de lunes a sábado, su negocio está ubicada en el centro de su comunidad , también se dedica a la crianza de cerdos estas actividades las aprendió de su madre quien dedicó la mayor parte de su vida a ello.

Eusebia  luego adquirió un crédito para poner su propia tienda y así comenzó con su negocio y hasta el día de hoy se mantiene trabajando y con ayuda de su hija mayor.


La señora tiene una experiencia de 28 años en trabajar en la crianza de cerdos, tortillería y tienda, actividad que aprendió de su madre quien era una persona muy dedicada y muy reconocida en la comunidad por su alto compromiso y buena disposición de ayudar a las demás personas. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar fertilizantes para su cultivo de maíz y compra de dos cerdos para la crianza, de esta manera ella podrá tener una mejor producción de maíz de la cual podrá garantizar una mejor alimentación a su familia.  

Los sueños de la señora son los de ver crecer a sus hijos y apoyar en todas las áreas de la vida para que sus hijos tengan todo lo necesario, adquirir un nuevo financiamiento para la instalación de una granja de cerdos, también ampliar su negocio y esto lo va lograr con ayudad de otro financiamiento según expreso y también se proyecta a comprar un vehículo el cual le facilitara el traslado de los cerdos.
texts.en:
Eusebia, 43, is very responsible and has excellent personal references in the community.  She is a single mother of three children, two sons and a daughter, who attend the community school.  She has a mini-market and sells tortillas, working Monday through Saturday.  Her business is located in the center of the community.  She also raises pigs.  She learned the businesses from her mother who spent most of her life in this line of work.

Eusebia took out a loan to establish her store and begin her business, and now she continues her work with the help of her eldest daughter.

She has 28 years' experience in raising pigs, selling tortillas and running the store, which she learned from her mother who was a very dedicated person and well known in the community for her commitment and good disposition toward helping others.

The loan she is requesting is to buy fertilizers for her corn crop and two pigs to raise.  This will give her better corn production and guarantee better food for the family.

Eusebia's dreams are to support her children in all aspects of their life so they will have everthing they need as they grow up, and to take out a new loan to set up a pig farm.  She also wants to expand her business with the help of a loan, and buy a vehicle for pig transportation.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her corn crop and two pigs to raise.

loans.name: Genara

texts.es: Genara de 41 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus 3 hijos 2 varones de 15 y 17 años y una niña de 12 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy tenaz que se gana la vida prestando sus servicios domésticos de forma domiciliar de lunes a viernes y los fines de semana se dedica a la venta de pollo, su esposo también aporta a la economía familiar gracias a su trabajo. Genara desea construir un servicio sanitario en su vivienda ya que actualmente no cuentan con uno. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y una taza para  construir el servicio lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Genara, 41, lives with her common-law husband and their three children, two sons, aged 15 and 17, and a girl, 12.  Genera is a very tenacious woman who earns a living working as a domestic employee Monday through Friday.  On weekends she sells chicken.  Her husband also contributes to the household economy thanks to his work.

Genara wants to build a bathroom in her house because she does not have one now.  She is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and a toilet so she can build the bathroom as soon as possible.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and a toilet to build a bathroom in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, groundnut oil, and fish

loans.name: Kelly

texts.es: Kelly de 22 años desde el año 2004 aprendió la preparacion de postres y derivados d ela harina de trigo, porque sus padres la enseñaron, para obtener su participación  en el hoy negocio en el cual los tres estan involucrados. Ellos elaboran hojaldres, postres y productos de panadería, que venden directamente al coinsumidos y en tiendas ubicadas en los alrededores de su negocio. Sus ventas las realiza de contado trabajando diariamente durante 6 horas al dia. Anteriormente Kelly recibió un credikito de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y le fue muy bien, Hoy está a´licando a un primer credikiva, segundo financiamiento que hace a aesta organización mediante el cual comprará 1 horno de 5 puertas, y materia prima como harina de trigo, escencias, grasas y azucar. Su mayor desafio es lograr el capital de trabajo suficiente para incrmentar su productividad y alzanzar su meta de mejorar sus ingresos familiares, lo cual es un exito para Kiva.
texts.en:
22 year old Kelly, since 2004 learned the preparation of desserts and grain products from wheat flour because her parents taught her in order to obtain her participation in the business today, in which the three of them are involved. They make puff pastries, desserts and bread products, which they sell directly to the consumers and in stores located around their business. They carry out their sales by working six hours a day, every day. 

Previously Kelly received a loan from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and it went very well for her. Today she is applying for her first Kiva loan, and second financing that she is making to this organization, means by which she will buy one oven with five doors and raw materials such as wheat flour, essences, fats and sugar. 

Her greatest challenge is to make enough capital from work in order to increase her productivity and to achieve her goal of improving her family income, which is a success for Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a five door oven and raw materials such as wheat flour, essences, fats and sugar.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install a toilet system in her home.

loans.name: Jose Eliberto

texts.es: José de 33 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos una niña de 2 años y un varón de 6 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida como motorista de una empresa distribuidora de productos a nivel nacional desde hace 8 años. José desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda y mejorar las paredes por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina, polines, grava, cemento y arena para cambiar el techo de su vivienda y mejorar las paredes.
texts.en:
José, at 33 years of age, lives with his life companion and their two children; a two-year-old girl and a six-year-old boy. He is a hardworking man that makes a living as a driver for a distribution company of products at a national level as of eight years ago. 

José wishes to change the roof of his home and to improve the walls, therefore he is requesting a loan from FUSAI in order to buy sheet, poles, gravel, cement and sand.

loans.use: to buy sheet, poles, gravel, cement and sand in order to change the roof on his home and to improve the walls.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a 26-year-old single man who only had an elementary education but is a very active and dynamic young man. He lives with his family in their own house in Sana'a city, Yemen. He works as a solider in the army. 

Mohammed wants to improve his house as he is getting married soon, and at the moment his home lacks furniture and home appliances. He plans to furnish his home with all new furniture. His income is enough to cover all the family expenses but not enough to furnish his house, so he has applied for a loan of 130,000 YER from AMB for this purpose.

He looks forward to improving the living conditions of his family by furnishing his house and purchasing home appliances.

loans.use: to purchase furniture and home appliances for his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks and biscuits to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy various articles and charcoal.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.en:
Dilorom lives in the north of Tajikistan. She was born in 1956, and is widowed with 2 children, who are now adults. 

She sells a variety of fruit in a local market - apples, peaches, cherries, etc. She has been working in buying and selling fruit for over 20 years, and she manages her business alone. 

Now Dilorom would like to increase working capital, so she is asking for a loan of 2,000 USD to buy more fruit. 

She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To increase working capital and buy more fruit to sell

loans.name: Samia

texts.en:
Samia is 23 years old and works from home as a tailor. She has been in this line of work for 5 years now and is proud to be contributing to her household income. 

A few years ago, her family faced a financial crisis as her husband’s earnings were not enough to meet the household expenses. She felt obliged to help her husband to improve her family’s living standards and started working from home. She is a brave and hardworking woman. 

She has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase a new stitching machine, some thread and stitching material. She is hopeful that her hard work will contribute to further improving her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine, thread and stitching material.

loans.name: Mayra Gisela

texts.es:
Mayra es una persona de 33  años de edad,  es una madre de 1hijo que encuentran estudiando educación básica en la escuela de su comunidad, la señora posee un negocio propio que se trata de un comedor que funciona todos los días de semana en horario de 6:00 am a 8: 00 pm está ubicada en el centro del municipio.

 Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable que cuenta con un excelente historial de crédito, es muy reconocida por las personas de su barrio por la actividad productiva, ella se dedicó a trabajar en una tienda cando era joven y fue allí donde adquirió experiencia, luego comenzó con su propio negocio impulsado por su esposo y su padre,  hasta el día de hoy se mantiene trabajando y con ayuda de su esposo le dan el sustento diario a su familia y garantizan los derechos fundamentales a su hijo.


La señora tiene una experiencia de 10 años con un espíritu emprendedor en todo lo que hace, además de sus obligaciones de madre y esposa y maneja su negocio, su esposo gana un sueldo decente trabaja como albañil prestando sus servicios de lunes a sábado a personas que lo solicitan, de esta manera cubren con las necesidades básicas de su hogar.


El dinero será invertido para comprar dos mesas para su comedor,  ya que se acercan las fiestas patronales de su municipio en la cual hay una gran demanda de comida tradicional y aprovechara para extender su negocio; ya que se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos y de esta forma dará un mejor servicio a sus clientes y tendrá mejor ganancias económicas.


Los sueños de la señora son los de ver a su hijo como un profesional ingeniero en construcción  graduado de la universidad, también ampliar su negocio y montar una granja de gallinas ponedoras para  vender huevos y carne de pollo, y adquirir un vehículo para el traslado de la mercadería.
texts.en:
Mayra is 33 years old, she is the mother of one child who is studying basic education in the community school. She has her own business that is made up of a dining hall that works every day of the week from 6:00 am until 8:00 pm. It is located in the center of the municipality. 

She is a very hardworking and responsible person that has an excellent credit history; she is very well known by the people in her neighborhood for her productive activity. She dedicated herself to working in a store when she was young, and it was there that she acquired experience and later began with her own business, driven by her husband and her father. Even today she supports herself working, and with the help of her husband they give their family the daily sustenance and guarantee their son his fundamental rights. 

Mayra has 10 years of experience with an entrepreneurial spirit in everything that she does aside from her obligations as mother and wife and directing her business. Her husband makes a decent living working as a mason, lending his services from Monday to Saturday to people who request him. In this way they cover all of the necessary expenses of their home. 

The money will be invested in order to buy two tables for their dining hall, since the patron saint festivals of their municipality are approaching, during which there is a great demand for traditional food, and she will take advantage of this in order to extend her business since she has become their main source of income, and in this way she will give better service to her customers and will have better economic gains. 

Her dreams are to see her son as a professional engineer in construction, graduated from university and also to amplify her business and to start a laying hen farm, in order to sell eggs and chicken meat, and to acquire a vehicle for the transfer of the merchandise.

loans.use: in order to buy two tables for her dining hall; since the patron saint's festivals are approaching in her municipality during which there is a great demand for traditional food and she will take advantage of this to extend her business.

loans.name: Demitria

texts.en:
Demitria is a 44-year-old woman with four children. She describes herself as highly self-motivated. 

She operates a bakery where she sells bread and pastries. She also sells grocery goods to increase her income. She has been involved in this business for more than twenty years, and it is located in an area which is good for business, with her primary customers being local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of enough money. 

She has requested this loan in order to buy additional raw ingredients to prepare bread and pastries to sell. Her goal is to improve her business and to make their lives better. 

She hopes that in the future she will succeed in life.

loans.use: to buy additional raw ingredients to prepare bread and pastries to sell

loans.name: Jocelyne

texts.en:
In order to have an additional source of income, Jocelyne has been engaged in selling Avon and personal products within her community. She aims to make this business profitable in order to supplement her husband's income. She is 57 years old, and has two adult-aged children. 

She wants to acquire more stock of these products to sell but she has insufficient capital. For this reason, she would like to access financial assistance of PHP 50,000 to purchase more stock of Avon products and personal items to resell. 

She is known as a kind and friendly mother, and so she hopes that she will be able to sell more of her products to her friends and her neighbors.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of Avon products and personal items to sell

location.town: Brgy. Sto. Domingo, Bambang, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Archielyn

texts.en:
Archielyn lives in her own house along with her life companion and their son. She is an honest and responsible person of very good character.

She sells a variety food in their village to make a living. She has sustained the business over the last ten years but it is not growing, so now Archielyn is applying for a loan to invest in another line of business which is swine fattening. She wants to buy piglets to be able to obtain greater income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy piglets

loans.name: Jessica Beatriz

texts.es: Jessica de 22 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar. Ella es una joven muy trabajadora que se gana la vida prestando sus servicios domésticos de forma domiciliar, además los fines de semana vende pollos en su cantón. Jessica desea colocar un techo al área donde esta el lavadero, la pila y el baño de su vivienda por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina, polines,arena, grava, cemento y hierro para construir la galera del área de lavadero.
texts.en: Jessica, 22, lives with her family. She is a young working woman who makes her living looking after household pets and sells chickens around her canton at the weekend. Jessica wants to put a roof over the laundry, bath and sink area of her home and is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy sheets, mounts, sand, gravel, cement and iron to construct a roof over the laundry area.

loans.use: to buy sheets and mounts for the roof and sand, gravel, cement and iron to build the pillars for the roof over the laundry area of her home.

loans.name: Senbagam Shg - Poothankudi Group

texts.en:
Forty-five-year-old Saraswathi is married and the leader of Senbagam Self-Help Group, which is managed by the local NGO, People’s Action for Transformation (PAT) in Tamil Nadu, India. Saraswathi is living in the Poothankudi village, Nagappattinam district.

Saraswathi lives in her own house with her child and husband, Kannan. Her husband is a marginal farmer in their village. 

Saraswathi and the other members are requesting a loan to purchase a smokeless stove, which is manufactured by Greenway Grameen Infra Pvt., Ltd. It costs 1,400 INR per stove. Smokeless stoves emit less carbon dioxide, which reduces smoke. Traditional stoves consume more time and money. The smokeless stove is highly efficient and designed for long-term use. This will allow a reduction in problems related to health, deforestation and climate change.

loans.use: to purchase a smokeless stove.

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en:
Musarat is a 46-year-old married woman. For the past 18 years, she has been running a business of making and selling food, from their home. Her business has prospered over time, and she is known for her tasty rice and “haleem” (a stew dish made with meat, grains and lentils). She is assisted by her son. She is able to earn enough through this business to contribute to the family income. 

She is in her fourth loan cycle with a good repayment history. She has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR, with which she wants to purchase stock of oil, rice, salt, spices and grains. Her wish is to provide good living standards to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase stock of oil, rice, salt, spices, and grains.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Fred, who is 35 years of age and a very courageous man and a hard worker. Fred hails from the Kisii area of Kenya, an area that is a highland and has good rainfall patterns. Fred has four children who he really adores and cherishes so much, and a beautiful wife who always paints a smile on Fred’s face. 

Fred practices mixed farming and has been doing this for the past ten years. Through the profits, he has been able to earn a decent and honest living. Fred generates income through milk-selling, egg-selling and personal business. Through these ventures, he has been able to take his children to school and afford a plate of food.

Fred has planted so many trees in his compound and also has Napier grass, which has high protein and is used to feed his dairy cow. As a result of this, Fred has been making a lot of profits through milk-selling. The demand has really increased, and he cannot sustain it. That is why he is requesting kindly for a loan of KES 67,600 to be able to buy a dairy cow and increase his number of dairy cows, so he can take advantage of the demand and market for milk in his area. Through the loan, Fred is sure of satisfying the demand for milk in his area. Also, food for his dairy cows will never be a problem because he has planted Napier grass.

Through increased profits, Fred is sure that he will repay the loan on time and also be in a position to comfortably take care of his family. Fred, with his entrepreneurial spirit, strength and tenacity, would like to continue fighting so that he can achieve his dream of owning his own business and empowering the society by being a source of employment.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fabrics, textiles, etc. to sew pants and shirts.

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en:
Kalsoom is a 30-year-old energetic lady. She has one child. Her husband is a farmer, and his income is not enough to fulfill the family needs. In order to overcome her financial problems, she decided to provide the service of tailoring to her community about ten years ago. 

She is in the sixth loan cycle and has requested a loan amount of 45,000 PKR to purchase spools of thread, needles, fabric marking pencils, laces, etc. She wants to improve her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to purchase spools of thread, needles, fabric marking pencils, laces, etc.

loans.name: Flordelis

texts.en:
Flordelis is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a balut making and vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing a loan from GDMPC to buy more eggs to make and sell balut.

Flordelis has been in this business for many years. She earns more income from selling balut in their village.

Flordelis has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from GDMPC. She dreams of  expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more eggs to make and sell balut

loans.name: Irshad

texts.en:
Irshad is a 51-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. In order to support her husband in taking care of the family, she began the business of milk selling. She is known in her town for providing good quality milk. She owns two buffalo. She is happily supporting her family with the income generated. She is in her sixth loan cycle. 

She has requested a loan of 55,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo and some feed. She is hopeful that increase in milk production will help her in generating more income.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo and some feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, rice and cooking seasoning to expand her  business.

loans.name: Vida

texts.en:
Vida is 45 years old and lives in the town of Teshie in Accra, Ghana. She is single. For the past nine years, Vida has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells cooking oils (palm oil and kennel oil). 

To help expand her business, Vida has requested a loan of GHS 2,000 from ID Ghana. The loan will be used to purchase more stock of palm oil and kennel oil, and will help Vida to generate greater profits and improve her standards of living. 

Vidaa hopes that in the future, she will be able to expand the business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock of palm oil and kennel oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, cement and stones to build a retaining wall. She also wants to repair her roof of her house and will buy tiles.

loans.name: Rodel

texts.en:
Rodel is a farmer who is raising his family in a rural community. He cultivates his farm by planting rice and some vegetables to sell. Due to the hardship of living, he aimed to improve his rice farming business in order to increase his yields and income to sustain the necessities of his family and give them a better living. 

In this regard, he wants to access a financial assistance of PHP 35,000 to buy the needed fertilizer and herbicides to sustain his rice production. Being a hardworking father, he hopes that he will increase his production and income through this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides needed for rice production

location.town: Brgy. Domang, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Nestor

texts.en:
Due to hardships, Nestor aimed to improve his rice farming business to increase his yields and income to satisfy the necessities of his family and finance the education of his children. He is 38 years old and has three schooling children. 

To sustain his rice production, he would like to avail a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy the needed farm inputs, like fertilizer and herbicides. Being a hard working father, he believes that he will improve his rice farming and increase his production.

loans.use: to buy the needed fertilizer and herbicides for rice farming

loans.name: Sri Poigaimariyamman Shg - Avoor Group

texts.en:
Malliga is leader of the Sri Poigaimariyamman Self-Help Group, which is formed by the local NGO, People Action for Transformation (PAT), in Tamil Nadu, India. This NGO helps people improve their livelihood.

Malliga is married and lives in Avoor village with her husband, Ramalingam. They have three children and live in their own house. Her husband is a farmer and works for daily wages.
 
Malliga has previously taken loans from the PAT for improving her economic conditions and has repaid the loans on time.

Malliga, like the other members of the group, is requesting a loan to buy a smokeless stove to have a healthy life. Smokeless stoves are economical and greatly reduce carbon emissions, limiting the toxic and hazardous effects of indoor pollution on children and women.

Malliga dreams of better careers for her children and hopes to improve their economic status.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove.

loans.name: Nyarai Pindirire

texts.en:
Nyarai is a 26-year-old married woman with two children. She resides in the Mt. Darwin district of Zimbabwe. She is a Camfed Learner Guide at the local secondary school, where she volunteers as a life skills facilitator. She also volunteers in her community by assisting the elderly. 

Nyarai operates a poultry business from her home, where she sells broiler chickens. She started the business from the small savings she collected after being trained as a Learner Guide. Originally, Nyarai started her business by producing a batch of 30 chickens every six weeks. However, her business has grown to producing 100 broilers every six weeks. She has been able to support herself and her family through her business. 

If given the loan, Nyarai is going to continue to increase the number of broilers she produces and buy vaccines for her chickens. The profits will support her family and allow her to help disadvantaged children in her community.

loans.use: To increase her chicks and buy vaccines

loans.name: Perveen

texts.en:
Perveen is 36 years old. She has five children and has been doing a business of scrap for the past 12 years.  She buys items made up of steel and other metals, such as pipes, construction items etc. in scrap. After properly crushing and recycling these scrap items, she sells them in the market. Through her business she makes enough profit to contribute to the family income. She is liable to provide her children with good food, health and education, so she requires earning more income to support her family well. 

She is in third loan cycle with Kashf Foundation, and she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy more scrap material such as parts of vehicles, steel, pipes etc. to inflate her sales. She expects a boost in her earnings, and wishes to spend part of profits on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy more scrap material such as parts of vehicles, pipes etc.

loans.name: Nyarai

texts.en:
Nyarai is a 26-year-old businesswoman and a single mother of two living in the Mudzi district of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully operating a flea market stall for the past ten months, thanks to a family member’s assistance. Nyarai sells shirts, skirts, shorts, bags, and shoes. She volunteers as a Learner Guide, promoting the importance of an education and leading weekly study and life skills sessions at a secondary school when she is not working at her flea market.

With the requested loan, Nyarai intends to make bulk purchases of clothes, plastic dishes, and buckets in order to expand her business into a large clothes shop, and be able to provide for her family.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is a 19-year-old businesswoman from the Mudzi district of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully operating a poultry project for a period of five months, after realizing that members of her community were not buying from local vendors. Cynthia now has a monthly capacity of 60 birds. She serves as a Cama (Camfed Alumni Network) member and volunteers every week as a Learner Guide with a class at a secondary school in her community.

With the requested loan, Cynthia intends to expand her poultry project by ordering more chicks and feed so that she can meet the demand of her customers and increase her profits. Her biggest dream is to be economically independent.

loans.use: To purchase more chicks to sell

loans.name: Readous

texts.en:
Readous is 22-year-old single woman from the Mt. Darwin district of Zimbabwe. She teaches helps students to build their study habits and life skills as a Camfed Learner Guide at the local high school. Further, Readous operates a grocery shop at her local business center, where she sells sugar, cooking oil, rice, flour, washing soap, soft drinks, and snacks. She hopes to one day to expand her business into a larger store. 

Readous will use the Kiva loan to purchase products in bulk to reduce costs and increase profits. Readous hopes to further her education and provide for her younger sister, as well.

loans.use: To increase her stock

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase containers, dishes and buckets for resale.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is married and has two children. Her husband is a farmer while she runs a cafeteria to earn a living. She also has a part-time job providing transportation and vehicle rental. 

For ten years of selling food, she was able to support the needs of her children's primary education. She thinks that in this service, she can earn profit to save for the future education of her children. 

She borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy raw ingredients to prepare food to sell. 

This picture shows her with the vehicle used for the transportation and rental business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients to prepare food to sell

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 56 years old. She is married and a mother of five children. 

She runs a retail shop in Mahayag town. She has been in the business for 20 years and currently makes an income to provide the needs of her family.

This being her first loan, she plans to use the amount to buy raw ingredients to prepare food to sell. This includes cooking oil, rice, flour, and sugar. She will use the anticipated income to pay school fees for her children.

Betty  hopes to grow her retail shop and be successful in her business and hence be able to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients to prepare food to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothing material to expand her business.

loans.name: Benita

texts.es:
Benita de 66 años de edad,  es una persona muy responsable con buena disposición de servicio a las personas de su comunidad, ella se creció con su padre quien se dedicaba a la agricultura y al cuido de ganado en terrenos de su propiedad, de esa forma ella aprendió el trabajo de la agricultura y cuido de ganado, ella carece de formación educativa ya que en la época en la que ella se creció se le dificulto el acceso a la educación, ya que su familia fue de escasos recursos económicos, y se dedicaron a la agricultura ya que se convirtió en su principal fuente de ingresos de esta manera suplían las necesidades básicas de su hogar.
  
La señora trabaja la agricultura desde los 12 años de edad, participaba en las actividades de cultivo de huertos, recogía leña menuda, cuidaba de los animales, cocinaba, cuidaba sus hermanos y realizaba todas las tareas de su hogar, todas estas actividades las aprendió de su padre y de su abuela quienes le inculcaron buenos principios y son los que la han llevado a salir adelante y ser una mujer de éxito y ejemplo para sus hijos y su comunidad.   

El dinero será utilizado en compra de fertilizantes y semilla de maíz mejorada, ya que en la época de invierno ella siempre realiza sus cultivos con ayuda de sus dos hijos, de esta manera obtendrán una mejor producción y podrá garantizar una alimentación y nutrición a su familia.  

Las proyecciones que la señora tiene para un futuro son las de ver a sus hijos graduados de la universidad, ya que se encuentran estudiando los últimos años de educación básica en la escuela de su comunidad. También planea haber terminado de pagar el crédito y adquirir un nuevo financiamiento para diversificar sus cultivos.
texts.en: Benita, 66 years old, is a very responsible person, with good disposition to serve the people in her community. She grew up with her father, who worked in agriculture and cattle raising in land of their own. This way she learned farm work and animal husbandry. She lacks education, because at the time she grew up it was difficult to study since her family always had scant financial resources. They worked in agriculture, which became their main source of income to supply their household basic necessities. The lady works in agriculture since she was 12 years old; she worked in vegetable gardens, picked up log, took care of animals, took care of her siblings and did all household chores. All these activities she learned from her father and her grandmother, who taught her good values, which have led her to advance and be a successful woman, a role model for her children and her community. She will use the money to buy fertilizers and improved corn seed, because in winter time she always works her crops with help of her two children. This way she will obtain better production and will be able to assure food and nutrition for her family. This lady's future goals are to see her children graduate from college, since they are now finishing the last years of basic education in their community school. She also plans to finish paying off her loan and get new financing to diversify her crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and improved corn seed because in winter time she always works her crops with help of her two children.

loans.name: Felipe De Jesús

texts.es:
Felipe de 71 años de edad, es un hombre que a pesar de su edad trabaja muy duro la tierra con ganas y espíritu de joven, comenta que él trabaja la tierra desde que tiene uso de razón ya que a su edad ya trabajo mucho, son ya varios años pero continua  siempre aunque sus fuerzas no son las mismas, pero sigue haciendo la lucha gracias a Dios,  tiene aun fuerzas para trabajar junto a sus hijos que le ayudan a pesar que están acompañados y tienen sus familias; Su esposa lo apoya y le ayuda con la temporada le enviá almuerzo a él y a sus ayudantes ya que trabaja muy duro a pesar de su edad. 

El préstamo se empleara para la compra de insumos para la milpa de la temporada agrícola, como abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas y herbicidas.

 Sus planes a futuro son siempre continuar trabajando hasta que Dios se lo permita.
texts.en:
Felipe is 71 years old. He is a man who despite his age works the land very hard with enthusiasm and with a youthful spirit. He says that he has worked the land since he can remember and at his age has worked a lot. It has been several years but he continues although his strength isn't what it once was. He keeps fighting, thank God, because he still has strength to work with his children who help him despite being married and having their own families. His wife supports him and helps during the season by sending lunch to him and his helpers, because he works very hard despite his age. 

The loan will be used to buy materials for the corn, such as fertilizer, pesticide and herbicide.  

His plans for the future are to keep working as long as God allows him to.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide, and herbicide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to restock clothing in her shop

loans.name: Rokhila

texts.en:
Rohila is 39 years old, married, and has seven children. Being a responsible mother, Rohila works hard every day to generate income so that she can cover her daily costs and send some of her children to school.  

She is dedicated to her farming business, growing onions and cucumbers on her own land. In order to contribute to improving her family's living standards, she has worked hard from early morning till late evening for 12 years.

She would like to develop her business. That is why she is asking for a loan in the amount of 5,000 TJS to purchase mineral fertilizers for the new planting season. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers for the new planting season.

loans.name: Behruz

texts.en:
Behruz is a 29-year-old married man; he has one son.  His family is IDP, and they leave in an IDP settlement. His wife is a housekeeper. 

Behruz  raises vegetables (greens, potatoes, onions, tomatoes and so on) and fruit trees (apples, pears, etc.). His monthly income is 220 AZN, and he has nine years of experience in this field. He gets an additional small income working as a driver.

People living in an IDP settlement have higher demands for such products as fresh fruit and vegetables. They prepare juice, fruit pies, etc., and make different kinds of salads. 

He needs to improve the conditions of his garden. Behruz  applied a 1,000  AZN loan to buy garden tools and repair it. He wants to get more money in order to improve his family's hard life.

loans.use: to buy garden tools and repair it

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida is 50 years of age. Her great skill in machine embroidery and experience of five years in this field has given her a very good reputation in her community. Her daughters also help in embroidery work. She provides stitching service to the women of her area too. 

Over years, the demand for her hand-embroidered cloth has grown and she uses the income generated to pay for the expenses of her five children.

Khalida is in her sixth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior. She has now requested a loan of 40,000 PKR, with which she wants to purchase a new embroidery machine, threads and beads, measuring tape, frames and tracing paper. 

She hopes that her skill will help in providing for her family’s health expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a new embroidery machine, threads and beads, measuring tape, frames and tracing paper.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more trading stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to boost flea market business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics for baby clothing

loans.name: Mazen Group

texts.en:
This group is called Mazen. It consists of four women who live inTaiz, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. 

Huda is the leader of the group. She is a 24-year-old single woman. She studied till elementary school. Her father is the sole breadwinner. Huda doesn't have a water tank to keep water to use in the house. She consumes a lot of water for all the work of the house. Huda's house is far from the well of the village. This causes a shortage water inside the house of Huda's family. Huda couldn't afford this condition. 

For this reason, Huda applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a water tank in order to keep a large amount of water to use in the house.

Huda looks forward to building a water tank inside her house to keep lot amount of water inside her house.

loans.use: to purchase a water tank

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a 25-year-old businesswoman. She has one child and lives in the Mudzi district of Zimbabwe. Because of her determination to succeed, she is a source of inspiration to many young people in her community. Juliet volunteers each week at the local secondary school as a Camfed Learner Guide, assisting students with their studies and helping clean the facility. For work, Juliet operates a grocery tuck-shop at her local business centre where she sells sugar, cooking oil, rice, flour, washing soap, soft drinks, and snacks.

Juliet will use the Kiva loan to purchase cartons of sugar, cooking oil, rice, flour, washing soap, soft drinks, and snacks to boost sales and profits. She hopes to expand her business into a retail shop if profits increase.

loans.use: To purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Norest

texts.en:
Norest is an 18-year-old businesswoman who resides in the Mudzi District of Zimbabwe. She has been successfully operating a business buying and selling clothes for over a year and half. She sells stockings, shoes, shirts, skirts, shorts, pants, bags, t-shirts, track suits, and dresses. 

When she is not working in the local flea market, she serves as a volunteer Learner Guide, assisting young students in the community.

With the requested Kiva loan, Norest intends to make bulk purchases of clothing items to reduce costs and boost her sales and profits. She is also looking forward to her business expanding so it can create employment opportunities in her community. Norest also intends to support her younger sisters.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more chicks and vaccines and to build a shelter for her chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make bulk purchases of grocery items, and to open a second shop at her home.

loans.name: Zahir

texts.en:
Zahir is a 30-year-old single man. He is a refugee and lives in an IDP (Internally Displaced Person) settlement. He is a farmer, and has been raising fruit trees and selling fruits at a local bazaar for nine years almost. His monthly income is 230 AZN (Azerbaijani new manat), and this is not enough for him to make his hard life better. That’s why he works additionally as a laborer when he has time.

Fresh fruits are very useful for people’s health because they include lots of vitamins. People know this and buy fruits more often than other foods and products. They prepare different sweets, jams, etc.

The condition of Zahir’s garden is very bad. Because of the rainy climate in that region, his harvest dies, and he can’t sell enough fruits to cover his demands. He applied for a 1,200 AZN loan in order to buy garden tools and make a small greenhouse for his trees.

loans.use: to buy garden tools and make a small greenhouse for his trees.

loans.name: Francisca Del Carmen

texts.es: Francisca de 24 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hija de 2 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida vendiendo pollos en su cantón, pero viendo las necesidad de tener más ingresos decidió poner una venta de tortillas en su domicilio, además vende curtido que ella misma elabora, su compañero de vida también aporta a los gastos del hogar con su trabajo de agricultor y jornalero.
